startMessage: Hello and Welcome! You can start by choosing your language of preference 👇

Locales.changeLocale: Choose the language you want to switch to 👇

Actions.home: Go back to the main menu 🔙

Prompts.start: Click the button so we can start helping you 👇
Prompts.options: How may i help you ? click what you want to do 👇
Prompts.cancel: Cancelled the operation, you can start again 🛑
Prompts.reviewService: Your opinion matters! This will be a simple survey about the service and product. Just follow along 👏
Prompts.comment: You can comment on the service or proceed by clicking the button 👇

Review.tracking: How was your shipment tracking experience 🚛 ?
Review.location: How precise was the delivery location 📫 ?
Review.status: How is the physical status of the product ?

Prompts.reportIssue: We are sorry to hear that, we will take you through a couple of steps to understand you and help you 🌧

Issue.comment: Please let us know about the problem by describing it 📝
Issue.photo: You can send a photo showing the issue, or continue using the button 📷

Prompts.noLocation: Looks like we don't have your location, please share it for better service 🗺
Prompts.shareLocation: Click the button to share your location 👇
